scripts.bs: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.prebuild: rimraf app/dist && npm run version-meta && npm run prepare-node && npm run generate-jwt && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && concurrently "npm run build-main" "npm run build-renderer"
scripts.build-e2e: node scripts/setup-tests.js && cross-env E2E_BUILD=true NODE_ENV=test npm run build
scripts.build-e2e-dev: rimraf app/dist && npm run version-meta && npm run prepare-node && cross-env E2E_BUILD=true concurrently "npm run build-main" "npm run build-renderer" "npm run build-web-dev"
scripts.build-e2e-web: node scripts/setup-tests.js && cross-env E2E_BUILD=true NODE_ENV=test && npm run prepare-web-pro && npm run build-web
scripts.bump-version: npm run third-party && cd app && yarn version && cd .. && npm run version-meta
scripts.cordova-add-android: cd cordova && cordova platform add android@9.1.0 && cd ..
scripts.cordova-add-ios: cd cordova && cordova platform add ios && cd ..
scripts.cordova-remove-android: cd cordova && cordova platform remove android && cd ..
scripts.cordova-remove-ios: cd cordova && cordova platform remove ios && cd ..
scripts.dev: npm run prepare-node && npm run generate-jwt && npm run generate-extensions && cross-env START_HOT=0 node -r @babel/register ./internals/scripts/CheckPortInUse.js && cross-env START_HOT=0 npm run start-renderer-dev
scripts.install-ext-node: rimraf app/node_modules && npx @tagspaces/dynamic-packages-loading ./app -p node && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-node-linux: rimraf app/node_modules && npx @tagspaces/dynamic-packages-loading ./app -p node --platform=linux --arch=x64 && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-node-mac: rimraf app/node_modules && npx @tagspaces/dynamic-packages-loading ./app -p node --platform=darwin --arch=x64 && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-node-mac-arm64: rimraf app/node_modules && npx @tagspaces/dynamic-packages-loading ./app -p node --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-node-win: rimraf app/node_modules && npx @tagspaces/dynamic-packages-loading ./app -p node --platform=win32 --arch=x64 && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-web: rimraf app/node_modules && npx @tagspaces/dynamic-packages-loading ./app -p web && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package-win && npm run package-linux && npm run package-mac && npm run package-web
scripts.package-android: npm run build-cordova && cd cordova && npm install && cordova build --release android
scripts.package-ci: npm run postinstall && npm run build && electron-builder --publish always
scripts.package-pro: rimraf app/node_modules && node scripts/enablepro.js && npm run install-ext-node && npm run build && npm run package-web-pro && npm run clean-maps && npm run package-win-pro && npm run package-linux-pro && npm run package-web-pro && npm run package-mac-pro
scripts.package-web: npm run prepare-web && zip -r ../builds/tagspaces-web.zip web -xi web/files/**\*
scripts.package-web-pro: npm run prepare-web-pro && zip -r ../builds/tagspaces-pro-web.zip web -xi web/files/**\*
scripts.prepare-cordova: npm run install-ext-web-check && npm run postinstall-cordova-check && rimraf cordova/www/dist && rimraf cordova/www/node_modules && shx cp -rL app/node_modules cordova/www && shx cp LICENSE.txt cordova/www
scripts.prepare-cordova-pro: npm run install-ext-web-check && npm run postinstall-cordova-check && rimraf cordova/www/dist && rimraf cordova/www/node_modules && shx cp -rL app/node_modules cordova/www && shx cp extensions/tagspacespro/EULA.txt cordova/www
scripts.prepare-node: npm run install-ext-node-check && npm run postinstall-electron-check
scripts.prepare-web: npm run version-meta && npm run install-ext-web-check && npm run postinstall-aws-check && rimraf web/modules && shx mkdir -p web/modules/@tagspaces/extensions && shx cp -rL app/node_modules/@tagspaces/extensions/* web/modules/@tagspaces/extensions/ && shx cp LICENSE.txt web && npm run build-web && node scripts/genswconf.js && npm run clean-maps
scripts.prepare-web-pro: npm run version-meta && npm run install-ext-web-check && npm run postinstall-aws-check && rimraf web/modules && shx mkdir -p web/modules/@tagspaces/extensions && shx cp -rL app/node_modules/@tagspaces/extensions/* web/modules/@tagspaces/extensions/ && shx cp extensions/tagspacespro/EULA.txt web && npm run build-web && node scripts/genswconf.js && npm run clean-maps
scripts.run-android: npm run prepare-cordova && npm run build-cordova && cd cordova && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.run-android-dev: npm run prepare-cordova && npm run build-cordova-dev && cd cordova && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.run-ios-dev: npm run prepare-cordova && npm run build-cordova-dev && cd cordova && cordova run ios && cd ..
scripts.run-web-dev: npm run prepare-web-pro && npm run build-web-dev && node scripts/webserver.js
scripts.skip:husky:pre-commit: node -e "require('fs').rename('./.git/hooks/pre-commit', './.git/hooks/pre-commit.disabled', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.source-map: npm run source-map-app && npm run source-map-web && npm run source-map-cordova
scripts.test-playwright: npm run test-refresh-data && cross-env npx playwright test --config ./playwright.config.js -g '^(?!.*\b_pro\b).*\belectron\b.*'
scripts.test-playwright-pro: npm run test-refresh-data && cross-env npx playwright test --config ./playwright.config.js -g '/\bTST0201\b/'
scripts.test-playwright-web: npm run test-refresh-data && cross-env npx playwright test --config ./playwright.config.web.js -g '/\bweb\b/'
scripts.test-pw-web-browsers: npm run test-refresh-data && cross-env DEBUG=pw:api npx playwright test --config ./playwright.config.web.browsers.js -g '/\bweb\b/'
scripts.test-playwright-web-headless: npm run test-refresh-data && cross-env HEADLESS_MODE=true npx playwright test --config ./playwright.config.web.js -g '/\bweb\b/'
scripts.test-clone-data: rimraf tests/testdata && git clone https://github.com/tagspaces/testdata tests/testdata
scripts.test-refresh-data: rimraf tests/testdata-tmp && shx mkdir -p tests/testdata-tmp/file-structure && shx cp -rL tests/testdata/file-structure tests/testdata-tmp
scripts.linux-fix-sandbox: sudo chown root:root node_modules/electron/dist/chrome-sandbox && sudo chmod 4755 node_modules/electron/dist/chrome-sandbox
scripts.ts-extension-symlink: rimraf app/node_modules/@tagspaces/extensions && cd app/node_modules/@tagspaces && ln -s ../../../extensions extensions && cd ../../..
